messages.subject: FYI Exin castles avail on ebay
messages.msgSnippet: Just wanted to let anyone who might be interested know that the actual Exin castles are avail for sale on ebay.  Since I am extremly interested in castles and
messages.messageBody:
Just wanted to let anyone who might be interested know that the
actual Exin castles are avail for sale on ebay. Since I am extremly
interested in castles and the mid-evil ear in general, I decided to
see if I could find a set of them after Sandra explained what they
were.

Sure enough, I found some on ebay (no big surprise there). However,
most of the sets are sold by one person and are only by "buy it
now." Also, Exin has several Far West sets that have forts and old
west towns.

I bought a set of each (a castle and a fort), told my DH that it was
for our DD but it's really for me! :)

Melissa
